mapper.sql: select a.id, a.title, a.writer_id, a.material, a.size_width, a.size_height,a.production_year, a.artwork_content, a.recruit_start_date, a.recruit_end_date, a.recruit_start_time, a.recruit_end_time, to_char(a.target_piece * 10000,'999,999,999,999,999,999') as target_price, to_char(a.achie_piece * 10000,'999,999,999,999,999,999') as achie_price, a.target_piece, a.estimated_price_max, a.estimated_price_min, a.achie_piece, to_char(a.sell_price,'999,999,999,999,999,999') as sell_price, a.total_transfer_tax, to_char(a.sell_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as sellDate, a.state, a.sell_place ,to_char(a.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate , w.writer_name, w.career, w.award_history, w.writer_info, w.file_chan_name, w.file_path, w.orgn_file_name, i.artwork_img as artwork_img, case when a.state = '0' then '모집 예정' when a.state = '1' then '모집 중' when a.state = '2' then '모집 완료' when a.state = '3' then '매각 투표' when a.state = '4' then '투표 종료' when a.state = '5' then '매각 중' when a.state = '6' then '수익 분배' when a.state = '7' then '매각 완료' end as state_name, trunc(a.sell_date - a.reg_date, 0) + 1 as retentionPeriod, round(sell_price / ((ESTIMATED_PRICE_MAX + ESTIMATED_PRICE_min)/2) * 100 - 100,2) as yield from sj_artwork_info a, sj_writer_info w, (select artwork_info_id, file_chan_name as artwork_img from sj_artwork_info_img where (artwork_info_id, id) in ( select artwork_info_id, max(id) as id from sj_artwork_info_img group by artwork_info_id )) i where a.writer_id = w.id and i.artwork_info_id = a.id

select * from ( select rownum rn, pa.* from (select a.id, a.title, a.writer_id, a.material, a.size_width, a.size_height,a.production_year, a.artwork_content, a.recruit_start_date, a.recruit_end_date, a.recruit_start_time, a.recruit_end_time, to_char(a.target_piece * 10000,'999,999,999,999,999,999') as target_price, to_char(a.achie_piece * 10000,'999,999,999,999,999,999') as achie_price, a.target_piece, a.estimated_price_max, a.estimated_price_min, a.achie_piece, to_char(a.sell_price,'999,999,999,999,999,999') as sell_price, a.total_transfer_tax, to_char(a.sell_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as sellDate, a.state, a.sell_place ,to_char(a.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate , w.writer_name, w.career, w.award_history, w.writer_info, w.file_chan_name, w.file_path, w.orgn_file_name, i.artwork_img as artwork_img, case when a.state = '0' then '모집 예정' when a.state = '1' then '모집 중' when a.state = '2' then '모집 완료' when a.state = '3' then '매각 투표' when a.state = '4' then '투표 종료' when a.state = '5' then '매각 중' when a.state = '6' then '수익 분배' when a.state = '7' then '매각 완료' end as state_name, trunc(a.sell_date - a.reg_date, 0) + 1 as retentionPeriod, round(sell_price / ((ESTIMATED_PRICE_MAX + ESTIMATED_PRICE_min)/2) * 100 - 100,2) as yield from sj_artwork_info a, sj_writer_info w, (select artwork_info_id, file_chan_name as artwork_img from sj_artwork_info_img where (artwork_info_id, id) in ( select artwork_info_id, max(id) as id from sj_artwork_info_img group by artwork_info_id )) i where a.writer_id = w.id and i.artwork_info_id = a.id order by a.reg_date desc) pa ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from sj_artwork_info
mapper.insert: insert into sj_purchase_info(id, artwork_info_id, member_id, piece_no, type, platform_usage_fee, vat) values('purchase' || seq_sj_purchase_info.nextval, #{artworkInfoId}, #{memberId}, #{pieceNo}, '1', #{platformUsageFee}, #{vat})
mapper.update: update sj_artwork_info set achie_piece = achie_piece + #{pieceNo} where id = #{artworkInfoId}
mapper.select: select (select nvl(sum(piece_no * piece_amt + platform_usage_fee + vat),0) from sj_purchase_info where member_id = #{memberId} and type = '1') + (select nvl(sum(piece_no * (piece_amt + platform_usage_fee + vat)),0) from sj_purchase_info where member_id = #{memberId} and type = '2') + (select nvl(sum(piece_no * piece_amt),0) from sj_purchase_info where member_id = #{memberId} and type = '3') as total from dual
mapper.update: update sj_artwork_info set state = 1 where recruit_start_date = #{today} and state = 0
update sj_artwork_info set state = 2 where recruit_end_date = #{today} and state = 1
mapper.select: select p.member_id, m.name, sum(piece_no) as total_piece_no from sj_purchase_info p, sj_member m where p.member_id = m.id and p.artwork_info_id = #{id} and type in ('1','2') group by p.member_id, m.name order by total_piece_no desc
select public_key from sj_member where id = #{memberId}
